import org.apache.spark.ml.feature.OneHotEncoder

import org.apache.spark.ml.tuning.ParamGridBuilder
import org.apache.spark.ml.tuning.CrossValidator
import org.apache.spark.ml.tuning.TrainValidationSplit
import org.apache.spark.ml.evaluation.MulticlassClassificationEvaluator
import org.apache.spark.ml.Pipeline

itemsDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: bigint, title: string, category: string, description: string]

res1: Array[org.apache.spark.sql.Row] = Array([Notebook], [Cloud Provider], [Distribution], [Distributed Cache], [UI], [BI], [Cluster Resource Manager], [Cluster Provision], [Message Broker], [Programming Language], [Streaming], [Distributed Coordinator], [Category], [Search Engine], [Data Processing Execution Engine], [Data Import], [Workflow], [File Format], [Library], [File System], [Database])

paragraphs.text:
val pipeline = new Pipeline()
  .setStages(Array(tokenizer, stopWordsFilter, tf, idf, word2Vec, featureVectorAssembler, categoryIndexer, classifier))

val metricName = "f1"

val modelEvaluator = new MulticlassClassificationEvaluator()
  .setLabelCol(classifier.getLabelCol)
  .setPredictionCol(classifier.getPredictionCol)
  .setMetricName(metricName)

val paramGrid = new ParamGridBuilder()
  .addGrid(tf.numFeatures, Array(10, 100, 1000))
  .addGrid(idf.minDocFreq, Array(1, 5, 10))
  .addGrid(word2Vec.vectorSize, Array(200, 300, 400))
  .addGrid(classifier.maxDepth, Array(1, 5, 10))
  .build()

// K-Folds Cross Validation Combined With Param Grid 
val modelValidator = new CrossValidator()
  .setEstimator(pipeline)
  .setEvaluator(modelEvaluator)
  .setEstimatorParamMaps(paramGrid)
  .setNumFolds(5)
